summary:
Health is all about feeling good physically and emotionally. It means your body works well, without any diseases or pain. You can keep yourself healthy by doing things like exercising regularly and getting enough sleep. Avoiding unhealthy habits like smoking is also important.

Some things that affect our health are under our control, like choosing to exercise. But other health factors are bigger, like having easy access to doctors. Some health issues are even genetic, which means they're passed down in families.
title: Health
